description: Camille Peri's lively and substantive dual biography of Fanny and Robert Louis Stevenson offers a glimpse of their unconventional marriage — and an inspiration for living fearlessly.
title: 'A Wilder Shore' charts the course of a famous bohemian marriage

description: As the Democratic Convention kicks off in Chicago, Republicans are among those expected to speak in support of Vice President Harris for president.
title: Republicans to rally support for Harris at the DNC

description: The seven-season show about a Baltimore police homicide unit didn’t feature gun battles and car chases. The tone, pacing and camera work were all groundbreaking when the show started in 1993.
title: Groundbreaking police drama 'Homicide: Life on the Street' is finally streaming
